name.fr: Boîte de Consommable de la Mise à Jour
name.jp: 消費型パッケージの更新
name.th: อัพเดท Consumable Package

description.en: A package containing 15x Upcut Stone, 15x Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold and 20x Scroll of Return. All items are also linked.
description.ar: A package containing 15x Upcut Stone, 15x Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold and 20x Scroll of Return. All items are also linked.
description.br: Ao abrir este pacote você receberá os seguintes itens: (x15) Pedra Mágica, (x15) Revigorante X ou Poção Suprema e (x20) Pergaminho do Retorno. Todos os itens são ligados à alma.

description.fr: Paquet qui contient 15 Pierres Mars, 15 Boissons Énergétiques X ou Fioles de Mana X et 20 Parchemins de Retour en Ville. Tous les objets sont liés.
description.id: Satu paket berisi 15x Upcut Stone, 15x Vital Drink X atau Refresher Hold dan 20x Scroll of Return. Semua item juga terhubung.

description.jp: パワーストーンx15、スタミナドリンクXまたは魔力ドリンクゴールドx15、往復の巻物x20が含まれたパッケージ。すべてのアイテムはリンクされています。

description.th: แพคเกจนี้ประกอบด้วย Upcut Stone 15 ชิ้น, Vital Drink X 15 ขวด หรือ Refresher Hold และ Scroll of Return 20 ชิ้น ไอเท็มทั้งหมดผูกมัด
description.tw: 一個包含 15x 力量之石、15x 活力多X 或 無限技能飲 和 20x 回程卷軸的禮包，所有物品皆為歸屬。
description.vi: Một gói chứa 15x Upcut Stone, 15x Vital Drink X hoặc Refresher Hold và 20x Scroll of Return. Tất cả các vật phẩm được liên kết.
